annotations.description: The East India Negroni uses a very un-modern sherry instead of vermouth and rum instead of gin for a rich, Christmasy winter warmer. Created by Jim Meehan to...
annotations.title: A modern spin on the classic Negroni

textContent:
45ml (1 1/2oz) dark rum [Diplomatico Reserva]
20ml (3/4oz) cream sherry [Lustau East India]
20ml (3/4oz) Campari
Orange twist to garnish

Stir over ice and strain into rocks glass over large ice cube. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K-Cp4Ii99lA
title: East Indian Negroni
